LanguageData.Decree_HarvestCrop.questDescriptionRules:
questDescription->[decreeIntro] 
You must harvest [plantToHarvest_label] x[harvestItemCount]. 
You may need to plant and grow the [plantToHarvest_label] first. 
[decreeThreatInfo]
LanguageData.Decree_HarvestCrop.root.nodes.2.name: decreeDays
LanguageData.Decree_HuntAnimal.root.nodes.1.name: decreeDays
LanguageData.Decree_BuildMonument.questDescriptionRul:
questDescription->[decreeIntro] 
You must build a monument. It is [monumentSize] in size and will require these resources (total value [monumentRequiredResourcesMarketValue_money]): 
[monumentRequiredResources] 
[decreeThreatInfo] 
You must keep the monument safe for [keepMonumentTicks_duration] after completion, otherwise [asker_nameDef] will be unhappy.
LanguageData.Decree_BuildMonument.root.nodes.3.name: decreeDays
LanguageData.Decree_BuildMonument.root.nodes.12.name: thingsToDrop
Since the monument marker has been destroyed, a new one has been sent.
You have completed construction of the monument.\n\nYou must keep it safe for [keepMonumentTicks_duration], otherwise [asker_nameDef] will be displeased.
[asker_nameDef] is offended that you allowed the monument to be ruined so soon after completion.\n\n[asker_pronoun] will be unhappy about this.
